org.jgentleframework.context
Class JGentle

java.lang.Object
  org.jgentleframework.context.JGentle

public abstract class JGentle
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for management and instantiation of container in JGentle system. It provides some static methods in order to configure JGentle system and instantiate container.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

                                   java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz)
Adds a config class

Parameters:
interfaze - type (interface) of config class.
clazz - the object class of config class need to be added.
Returns:
returns the previous object class of config class appropriate to interfaze if it existed, if not, returns null.
